docs.title: Flask Endless User Level XP System
docs.text: This app is an endless user-based level and XP (experience points). It uses SQlite and SQLAlchemy to store user data in the database.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository.
  2. Install the requirements: pip install -r requirements.txt.
  3. Run the app: python app.py.
  4. Create a migration using flask db init.
  5. Create a migration script using flask db migrate.
  6. Apply the migration using flask db upgrade.
  7. Run the app using flask run.
  8. Open localhost:8081 on your web browser.
